attributes.action: allow the english people a vote of no confidence
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: to allow the english people of the uk to vote, a vote of no confidence in the present or future goverments by the ordinary people of this once great land.it should not just be left upto mp's to have a vote behind closed doors it should be our right to vote on major issue's that effect our lives.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
